short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show the Cardano ticker price and set an alert so that the browser icon will flash when the alert price is passed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Display CARDANO ticker price and set an alert that will flash the CARDANO browser icon when the alert price is passed.
A ticker to display the current price of the CARDANO cryptocurrency in USD in your browser. Price updates about once per minute.

You can also set an alert price for CARDANO, and the browser icon will blink to notify you if and when the latest price has crossed the alert price.

Price gains and losses over the past one hour are signified by the color of the browser icon badge. It will be green for gains, and red for losses.

Latest price is provided by the Binance exchange.

Buy me a beer?
